commonQuestions.question: What's your experience with AI integration?
commonQuestions.answer: I specialize in integrating intelligent automation into production applications. In AppliTrak, I built a resume screening system that reduced processing time by 90%. In K-Wise, I created a hybrid engine with 3,200+ rules for real-time compatibility checking. I focus on privacy-first, cost-effective solutions that deliver measurable business value.

commonQuestions.question: Tell me about your best project
commonQuestions.answer: AppliTrak is my flagship project—an enterprise job portal with automated resume-to-job matching using local AI. The system handles 60+ REST endpoints, multi-role authentication, and integrates 3 external job APIs. I'm most proud of reducing manual screening from 5-7 minutes to 30 seconds while maintaining 75% AI accuracy and zero cloud costs through local LLM processing.

commonQuestions.question: What technologies do you use?
commonQuestions.answer: My core stack is React, Node.js, Express, and MongoDB. I'm proficient in JWT authentication and RESTful API design. I'm also experienced with performance optimization, real-time systems (SSE), and developer tools like Git, GitHub Copilot, and Figma.

commonQuestions.question: Are you available for hire?
commonQuestions.answer: Yes! I'm actively seeking full-time opportunities in full-stack development, AI integration, or building scalable systems. I'm based in Calamba, Laguna but open to remote or hybrid arrangements. I'd love to discuss how I can contribute to your team. Feel free to reach me at mesinajake9@gmail.com or +639473492672.

commonQuestions.question: How do you approach performance optimization?
commonQuestions.answer: I'm obsessive about performance because it directly impacts user experience. In K-Wise, I achieved <300ms response times through LRU caching, lazy loading for 1000+ images, and debounced API calls. I always measure impact with real metrics—like the 87% reduction in build time and 99.5% uptime. Performance isn't just about speed; it's about delivering value to users and businesses.

commonQuestions.question: What's your approach to backend development?
commonQuestions.answer: I build enterprise-grade backends with Node.js and Express.js, focusing on RESTful APIs, JWT authentication, and RBAC systems. In AppliTrak, I architected 60+ endpoints with complete multi-role authentication. I design MongoDB schemas with proper indexing (including geospatial), implement aggregation pipelines for analytics, and ensure secure file handling for document parsing.

commonQuestions.question: Can you explain your technical proficiency?
commonQuestions.answer: My overall technical proficiency is 82%, with strengths in JWT Authentication (92%), MongoDB (88%), API Integration (86%), Node.js (85%), and JavaScript (85%). I'm continually improving in AI Integration (75%) and React (78%). These numbers reflect my real-world project experience—for example, the 60+ REST endpoints in AppliTrak and 150+ API integrations in K-Wise.

commonQuestions.question: What makes you different from other developers?
commonQuestions.answer: I focus on business impact, not just technical implementation. My projects show measurable results: 90% time reduction in AppliTrak, 85% consultation elimination in K-Wise, 87% build time improvement. I combine modern AI with practical solutions, prioritize privacy-first approaches, and always optimize for performance. I speak in metrics because numbers tell the real story of value delivered.

commonQuestions.question: Can you start immediately?
commonQuestions.answer: My availability depends on current commitments. For the right opportunity, I can often start within 2-4 weeks. I believe in professional handovers and ensuring quality transitions.
